questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) A sign with text

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An announcement
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A scenic view
C) A sign with text
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) Text
D) A building

What language is the text in the photo written in?
A) English only
B) Spanish only
C) Both English and Spanish
D) French

What does the text in the photo say?
A) "Closed"
B) "Coming Soon"
C) "Open Now"
D) "Under Construction

What is the color of the sign in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red and white
D) Yellow

What is the background color of the sign?
A) Black
B) White
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the foreground element of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A sign with text
D) A car

What is the texture of the sign in the photo?
A) Smooth and glossy
B) Rough and matte
C) Cracked and worn
D) Metallic and shiny

What is the condition of the sign in the photo?
A) Brand new
B) Slightly worn with creases
C) Heavily damaged
D) Perfectly intact

What is the predominant color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) Orange

What is the secondary language on the sign?
A) French
B) Spanish
C) German
D) Italian

What is the orientation of the sign in the photo?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What is the font style of the text on the sign?
A) Handwritten
B) Serif
C) Sans-serif
D) Script

How many languages are used on the sign?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the contrast like between the text and the background?
A) High contrast
B) Low contrast
C) No contrast
D) Medium contrast

What is the visibility of the text on the sign?
A) Very clear
B) Somewhat clear
C) Hard to read
D) Not visible

What is the message conveyed by the sign?
A) An urgent warning
B) An upcoming event or opening
C) A closure notice
D) A promotional offer

What is the border color of the sign?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) White
D) Yellow

What is the alignment of the text on the sign?
A) Left-aligned
B) Center-aligned
C) Right-aligned
D) Justified

What is the condition of the sign in terms of wear and tear?
A) Pristine
B) Slightly creased
C) Heavily damaged
D) Torn

What is the likely material of the sign?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Paper or cardboard
D) Wood

What is the top line of the text on the sign?
A) "Closed"
B) "Coming Soon"
C) "Open Now"
D) "Under Construction

What is the likely emotion conveyed by the sign?
A) Excitement
B) Fear
C) Sadness
D) Anger

What is the likely action expected from the viewer of the sign?
A) To be cautious
B) To anticipate something new
C) To leave the area
D) To follow directions

What is the background element of the photo?
A) A building
B) A tree
C) Another sign
D) Text on another surface

What is the likely color scheme of the sign?
A) Monochromatic
B) Complementary colors
C) Analogous colors
D) Triadic colors

What is the likely design style of the sign?
A) Simple
B) Vintage
C) Rustic
D) Futuristic

What is the primary language used in the sign?
A) English
B) Spanish
C) French
D) Both English and Spanish

What is the color of the text on the sign?
A) Black
B) White
C) Red
D) Yellow
